Data Science: Experience with Python, SQL, machine learning, and data visualization tools. Ability to work with large datasets and extract insights.
HR: Understanding of HR practices, recruitment, payroll, and performance management. Strong communication skills.
Data Analyst: Proficiency in SQL, Excel, Power BI or Tableau. Ability to interpret and visualize data to support business decisions.
Full Stack: Experience in both frontend and backend technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and databases such as MySQL or MongoDB.
Backend: Strong knowledge of server-side languages (Node.js, Java, Python), APIs, databases, and security best practices.
Frontend: Expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, frameworks like React or Angular. Ability to build responsive and interactive user interfaces.
